original_text: If you lend something to your neighbour you may take something from him as a guarantee. But do not go into his house to take it.
korean_text: 네 이웃에게 무엇을 꾸어줄 때에 너는 그의 집에 들어가서 전당물을 취하지 말고

sentences.original_text: If you lend something to your neighbour
you may take something from him as a guarantee
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그에게서 담보물로 무언가를 가져올 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: But do not go into his house
